languages.text: "Вероятно, я проводила его предварительный допрос. Как и многих других. Хротко привлек меня к дознанию из-за моего опыта обращения с чернью. Однако я клянусь, что его обвинения — ложь!"

"I may have conducted his preliminary interrogation, like so many others. Hrotko requested my assistance because of my experience in dealing with the rabble. But I swear that there is no truth to these accusations against me!"
languages.original_text: "Вероятно, я проводила его предварительный допрос. Как и многих других. Хротко привлек меня к дознанию из-за моего опыта обращения с чернью. Однако я клянусь, что его обвинения — ложь!"

traits.locale_text: "I may have conducted his preliminary interrogation, like so many others. Hrotko requested my assistance because of my experience in dealing with the rabble. But I swear that there is no truth to these accusations against me!"
"I must have conducted his preliminary interrogation, like so many others. Hrotko brought me into the investigation because of my experience in dealing with the rabble."
"I must have conducted his preliminary interrogation, like so many others. Hrotko brought me into the investigation because of my experience in dealing with the rabble."

"I may have conducted his preliminary interrogation, like so many others. Hrotko requested my assistance because of my experience in dealing with the rabble. But I swear that there is no truth to these accusations against me!"

languages.text: "Mag sein, dass ich seine Erstbefragung durchgeführt habe, wie bei vielen anderen. Hrotko hat mich aufgrund meiner Erfahrung im Umgang mit diesem Gesindel um Hilfe gebeten. Aber ich schwöre, dass diese Anschuldigungen gegen mich absolut haltlos sind!"
languages.original_text: "I may have conducted his preliminary interrogation, like so many others. Hrotko requested my assistance because of my experience in dealing with the rabble. But I swear that there is no truth to these accusations against me!"

traits.locale_text: "Mag sein, dass ich seine Erstbefragung durchgeführt habe, wie bei vielen anderen. Hrotko hat mich aufgrund meiner Erfahrung im Umgang mit diesem Gesindel um Hilfe gebeten. Aber ich schwöre, dass diese Anschuldigungen gegen mich absolut haltlos sind!"

languages.text: « J'ai peut-être mené un interrogatoire préliminaire, comme avec tant d'autres. Hrotko avait demandé mon aide, en raison de mon expérience avec la populace. Mais je jure que les accusations portées contre moi sont entièrement fausses ! »
languages.original_text: "I may have conducted his preliminary interrogation, like so many others. Hrotko requested my assistance because of my experience in dealing with the rabble. But I swear that there is no truth to these accusations against me!"

traits.locale_text: « J'ai peut-être mené un interrogatoire préliminaire, comme avec tant d'autres. Hrotko avait demandé mon aide, en raison de mon expérience avec la populace. Mais je jure que les accusations portées contre moi sont entièrement fausses ! »

languages.text: «Puede que yo llevase a cabo el interrogatorio preliminar, como tantos otros. Hrotko solicitó mi ayuda debido a mi experiencia tratando con morralla. ¡Pero le juro que esas acusaciones no tienen ningún fundamento!».
languages.original_text: "I may have conducted his preliminary interrogation, like so many others. Hrotko requested my assistance because of my experience in dealing with the rabble. But I swear that there is no truth to these accusations against me!"

traits.locale_text: «Puede que yo llevase a cabo el interrogatorio preliminar, como tantos otros. Hrotko solicitó mi ayuda debido a mi experiencia tratando con morralla. ¡Pero le juro que esas acusaciones no tienen ningún fundamento!».

languages.text: 「その男の予備尋問は私が行っていたかもしれません。フロトコが私に協力を求めたのは、暴徒の相手を経験したことがあるからです。ですが、私に対するこのような非難は真実ではないと誓います！」
languages.original_text: "I may have conducted his preliminary interrogation, like so many others. Hrotko requested my assistance because of my experience in dealing with the rabble. But I swear that there is no truth to these accusations against me!"

traits.locale_text: 「その男の予備尋問は私が行っていたかもしれません。フロトコが私に協力を求めたのは、暴徒の相手を経験したことがあるからです。ですが、私に対するこのような非難は真実ではないと誓います！」

languages.text: “我确实对许多人进行过初步审讯，他也是其中一个。当时赫洛卡请求我协助进行审讯，因为我知道如何对付那些乌合之众。但我可以发誓，这些针对我的指控都是谎言！”
languages.original_text: "I may have conducted his preliminary interrogation, like so many others. Hrotko requested my assistance because of my experience in dealing with the rabble. But I swear that there is no truth to these accusations against me!"

traits.locale_text: “我确实对许多人进行过初步审讯，他也是其中一个。当时赫洛卡请求我协助进行审讯，因为我知道如何对付那些乌合之众。但我可以发誓，这些针对我的指控都是谎言！”

languages.text: "Daha niceleri gibi onun da ilk sorgusunu ben yapmış olabilirim. Hrotko, ayaktakımıyla başa çıkma deneyimimden dolayı yardımımı istemişti. Ancak yemin ederim ki bana yöneltilen tüm bu suçlamalar asılsız!"
languages.original_text: "I may have conducted his preliminary interrogation, like so many others. Hrotko requested my assistance because of my experience in dealing with the rabble. But I swear that there is no truth to these accusations against me!"
